text: Netflix‘s new TV and movie releases for February 24 – March 2 2025 include shows Running Point and Toxic Town, as well as Despicable Me 4. Then on February 27, Running Point and Toxic Town will drop on Netflix. Running Point is a comedy series created by Mindy Kaling. The series follows Isla Gordon (Kate Hudson), a former party girl and only sister in a family of brothers. However, things change when a scandal leads to her brother’s resignation. Gordon takes his place as the president of a basketball team and sets out to prove herself to her brothers and other skeptics. Meanwhile, Toxic Town is a drama series following a group of mothers who go on a mission to find and expose the people responsible for the disabilities that befall their newborn babies. Also releasing on Netflix this week are Seasons 5 and 6 of the police-procedural comedy series Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and the films Despicable Me 4 and Sonic the Hedgehog 2. Brooklyn Nine-Nine finds Jake Peralta learning to be a rule-abider and team player when his squad is put under a new police captain. Meanwhile, Despicable Me 4 sees Gru and his family fight a new enemy, Maxime Le Mal, who makes them go on the run from authorities. Sonic the Hedgehog 2 sees Sonic and Tails team up to stop Dr. Robotnik and his partner Knuckles from stealing a powerful emerald. New Netflix releases for February 24 – March 2 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from February 24 – March 2 2025. February 25 Full Swing Season 3 Really Love Watcher February 26 Brooklyn Nine-Nine Seasons 5-6 Miss Italia Mustn’t Die A Copenhagen Love Story February 27 Demon City Running Point The Wrong Track Toxic Town Graveyard Season 2 February 28 Aitana: Metamorphosis Squad 36 Roosters Despicable Me 4 Sonic the Hedgehog 2 NOTE: March 1-2’s schedule is unavailable as of writing. For more Netflix content, check out our interview with Zero Day’s Joan Allen.
html:
Netflix‘s new TV and movie releases for February 24 – March 2 2025 include shows Running Point and Toxic Town, as well as Despicable Me 4.

Then on February 27, Running Point and Toxic Town will drop on Netflix.

Running Point is a comedy series created by Mindy Kaling. The series follows Isla Gordon (Kate Hudson), a former party girl and only sister in a family of brothers. However, things change when a scandal leads to her brother’s resignation. Gordon takes his place as the president of a basketball team and sets out to prove herself to her brothers and other skeptics.

Meanwhile, Toxic Town is a drama series following a group of mothers who go on a mission to find and expose the people responsible for the disabilities that befall their newborn babies.

Also releasing on Netflix this week are Seasons 5 and 6 of the police-procedural comedy series Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and the films Despicable Me 4 and Sonic the Hedgehog 2.

Brooklyn Nine-Nine finds Jake Peralta learning to be a rule-abider and team player when his squad is put under a new police captain. Meanwhile, Despicable Me 4 sees Gru and his family fight a new enemy, Maxime Le Mal, who makes them go on the run from authorities.

Sonic the Hedgehog 2 sees Sonic and Tails team up to stop Dr. Robotnik and his partner Knuckles from stealing a powerful emerald.

New Netflix releases for February 24 – March 2 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Netflix from February 24 – March 2 2025.

February 25

  • Full Swing Season 3
  • Really Love
  • Watcher

February 26

  • Brooklyn Nine-Nine Seasons 5-6
  • Miss Italia Mustn’t Die
  • A Copenhagen Love Story

February 27

  • Demon City
  • Running Point
  • The Wrong Track
  • Toxic Town
  • Graveyard Season 2

February 28

  • Aitana: Metamorphosis
  • Squad 36
  • Roosters
  • Despicable Me 4
  • Sonic the Hedgehog 2

NOTE: March 1-2’s schedule is unavailable as of writing.

For more Netflix content, check out our interview with Zero Day’s Joan Allen.
